      Methods in bgu.spl.mics with parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected <T> void MicroService.complete(Request<T> r, T result)
      complete the received request r with the result result using the message-bus.
      <T> void MessageBus.complete(Request<T> r, T result)
      Notifying the MessageBus that the request r is completed and its result was result.
      boolean MessageBus.sendRequest(Request<?> r, MicroService requester)
      add the Request r to the message queue of one of the micro-services subscribed to r.getClass() in a round-robin fashion.
      protected <T> boolean MicroService.sendRequest(Request<T> r, Callback<T> onComplete)
      send the request r using the message-bus and storing the onComplete callback so that it will be executed in this micro-service event loop once the request is complete.
